item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.0 - 2023-10-07 # Added # Support for NDMF integration #375 Pre-building validation for MergeBone #417 There are some (rare) cases that are not supported by MergeBone. This adds warning for such case. Validation error for self recursive MergeSkinnedMesh #418 Advanced Settings Section for Trace and Optimize #419 Moved Use Advanced Animator Parser to there Added Exclusions for exclude some GameObjects from optimization In this section, there are for debugging GC Objects #464 Avoid Name Conflict in MergeBone #467 Full EditMode Preview of RemoveMesh Components #500 Significant Performance Improvements with small code changes #523 Changed # Improved ‘Remove Unused Objects’ #401 Remove Unused Objects now removes unnecessary Components & Bones!
